short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome extension to view Muslim prayer local time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salah Time is a browser extension which shows the daily Muslim Prayer local time based on the location. It's a highly configurable extension allowing to set/change location automatically or manually. And it also allows the user to fine-tune/offset prayer times and set prayer time calculation method. No User data or Cookie is collected.


Features
- Plays Adhan at the prayer time
- Offline Usability (After fetching the prayer times for first time online)
- Set Location Automatically or Manually (*Need Internet Connection!*)
- Light and Dark mode to suit user preferences
- Change Extension Scale / Zoom.
- Tune / Offset prayer time in minutes

Please note that prayer timings might not always match your local mosque or government authority. Their timings need to be tuned or adjusted.

Website: www.salah-time.com
